name: MegaGlest
description: MegaGlest is a 3D real-time strategy (RTS) game, where you control the armies of one of seven different factions: Tech, Magic, Egypt, Indians, Norsemen, Persian or Romans. A game of MegaGlest takes place on a map of varying size, such as large plains and fields, with terrain features like rivers, mountains, seas, or cliffs. Players must establish settlements to gain energy, food, gold, housing, stone and wood to built their bases, and defend against other players by micro management and strategy matter. It supports up to eight players online, cross-platform multiplayer game.

zh_CN.description: MegaGlest 是一款3D即时战略游戏，取材于中世纪背景，有七种不同阵营：魔法、科技、埃及人、印度人、古挪威人、波斯人、罗马人，MegaGlest 有多种地图大小，而且有着平原、山脉、河流等多种地形，玩家需要通过获取能源、食品、黄金、石头、木材等多种资源来建设自己的基地，通过微观管理和战略思维来战胜敌人，最多支持8名玩家在线跨平台多人游戏。
zh_CN.name: MegaGlest
